titleStmt.title: A short vindication of The relapse and the provok'd wife from immorality and prophaneness by the author.
titleStmt.author: Vanbrugh, John, Sir, 1664-1726.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Vanbrugh. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
A reply to Jeremy Collier's, A short view of the immorality and profaness of the English stage.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
